label: Young(18-24 year old) Female social media manager
Passionate & Reliable
description: Genuine interest in our mission and a strong desire to make a positive impact, responsible, and committed to fulfilling volunteer commitments.

label: Adaptable, Team Player & Strong Communication Skills
description: Able to work effectively in diverse teams; and contributes positively. Flexible and open to embracing new challenges and shifting priorities; Clear verbal and written communication, active listening, and constructive feedback.

label: Respectful
